mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SQUARE DANCES "Loose Talk", "Cotton Picker", and "Dixie Bounce" ROUND DANCES "Getting to Know You" and "Rose Room R/M" SPECIAL FEATURES "Press Time Bulletins from San Diego", "Silver Spur Award", "High Level Square Dance", "It's Fun to Be M.C.", "Drive-In Church Made Possible", "Asilomar Faculty", "Style Series: Twirls - Whirls", "Phoenix' Square Dance Daddy", "A Reading Corner", and "The Dime: Goes Marching On". This edition also includes the the regular features entitled "As I see it", "Woman on the Square", "On The Record", "The Square of the Month", "Round the Outside Ring", "From the Floor" and "Calendar of Square Dancing Events".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
